text: The Blue Cross Blue Shield Tower (BCBS) is located on the north end of Grant Park along E. Randolph Street at the NE corner of Randolph and Columbus Drive, in Chicago, Illinois, United States. It is home to the headquarters of Health Care Service Corporation. ==Other websites== * Phorio listing * Emporis listing Category:Skyscrapers in Chicago Category:1997 establishments in the United States Category:2010 establishments in the United States
title: Blue Cross Blue Shield Tower
